articles.description: Follow action from Sunday's six games in the Premier League including Leicester v Man City, Spurs v Wolves and West Ham v Liverpool.
articles.title: Premier League LIVE: Six games including Leicester v Man City, Everton v Nottingham Forest, Spurs v Wolves, West Ham v Liverpool - radio & text

articles.description: Pep Guardiola celebrates 500 games in charge of Manchester City with a nervy win over Leicester.
articles.title: Leicester City 0-2 Manchester City: Pep Guardiola celebrates milestone as Erling Haaland scores in victory

articles.description: South Africa secure their place in June's World Test Championship final by holding their nerve to beat Pakistan by two wickets on an enthralling fourth day of the first Test in Centurion.
articles.title: South Africa qualify for World Test Championship final by beating Pakistan

articles.description: Crucial lower-order runs keep Australia in the ascendancy on a gripping fourth day of the fourth Test against India in Melbourne.
articles.title: Australia v India: Lyon and Boland shine after Bumrah brilliance

articles.description: Listen to Open all Mics or Sportsound commentary from Celtic Park or Fir Park, plus Sportscene results and follow live text updates from Sunday's Scottish Premiership fixtures.
articles.title: Scottish Premiership: Celtic & Rangers among 10 teams in action - radio & text: BBC Sport

articles.description: The world's second tallest man, a Taylor Swift kiss and Cristiano Ronaldo's tears - the best sports photos of 2024, in the words of the photographers who took them.
articles.title: Best sports photos of 2024: Photographers explain stories behind images

articles.description: The Los Angeles Chargers book their place in the NFL play-offs with a dominant 40-7 victory at the New England Patriots.
articles.title: NFL: Los Angeles Chargers beat New England Patriots

articles.description: Novak Djokovic credits Andy Murray with "bringing a fresh look" to his game as he prepares for his first tournament since naming his former rival as his new coach.
articles.title: Novak Djokovic credits coach Andy Murray with bringing 'fresh look' to his game

articles.description: Chelsea boss Enzo Maresca believes Ipswich striker Liam Delap, who he coached in Manchester City's academy, can become an important player for England.
articles.title: Liam Delap can become 'an important player for England' - Enzo Maresca

articles.description: Former West Ham goalkeeper Ludek Miklosko announces his decision to withdraw from further cancer treatment, three years after his diagnosis.
articles.title: Ludek Miklosko: Former West Ham goalkeeper withdraws from cancer treatment
